iopair.name: C-C124A-GIMP-09-ST03-DT05-DF11-CF23-01-BAD-02
iopair.description: Has a fixed stack buffer of size 64. (char [64])

process.script: /opt/stonesoup/workspace/scripts/service_mon.sh ss-localhost 8887 && curl -v --data-urlencode data="This is probably going to overflow a buffer of some sort. Let's run it anyway and see what happens. I hope that everything turns out ok, because I would love to see what this looks like in all CAPS. Converting ASCII characters to upper case is easy, you can either call a system function, or just add the standard difference between the start of the two character sets. But, I am sure there is a reason that system functions exist for this sort of functionality." --header "If-Match: weak_taint_source_value" --request POST --no-buffer --output /opt/stonesoup/workspace/testData/logfile.txt --silent --show-error http://ss-localhost:8887

scoring_formula.formula: weakness_started_w6pYVeWsQJnzqphs0JrH AND ((NOT PERFORMER AND (segfault_code_osaPLGXoms OR segfault_code_hRrNULVfLQ OR segfault_code_Qj7d52FekW OR segfault_code_SBaNdFnJb1 OR segfault_code_t52tPTxDCs OR segfault_msg_xm8MOnOpwu OR illegal_inst_msg_kYNONdlpUq) AND NOT timeout_AAszUpo2hA) or (PERFORMER AND NOT ((segfault_code_osaPLGXoms OR segfault_code_hRrNULVfLQ OR segfault_code_Qj7d52FekW OR segfault_code_SBaNdFnJb1 OR segfault_code_t52tPTxDCs OR segfault_msg_xm8MOnOpwu OR illegal_inst_msg_kYNONdlpUq) OR timeout_AAszUpo2hA OR controlled_exit_uKbI2Je47n)))

(NOT PERFORMER AND (segfault_code_osaPLGXoms OR segfault_code_hRrNULVfLQ OR segfault_code_Qj7d52FekW OR segfault_code_SBaNdFnJb1 OR segfault_code_t52tPTxDCs OR segfault_msg_xm8MOnOpwu OR illegal_inst_msg_kYNONdlpUq) AND NOT timeout_AAszUpo2hA) or (PERFORMER AND NOT ((segfault_code_osaPLGXoms OR segfault_code_hRrNULVfLQ OR segfault_code_Qj7d52FekW OR segfault_code_SBaNdFnJb1 OR segfault_code_t52tPTxDCs OR segfault_msg_xm8MOnOpwu OR illegal_inst_msg_kYNONdlpUq) OR timeout_AAszUpo2hA OR controlled_exit_uKbI2Je47n))
